events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department due to your background in software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering talent has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your experience in software engineering and assess your fit for the role.
The candidate provided detailed answers and expressed enthusiasm about working in our engineering team.
A technical interview has been scheduled to evaluate your coding skills and problem-solving abilities in real-time.
The technical interview was successfully completed with strong performance shown in algorithmic challenges and system design.
An HR interview is scheduled to discuss your career goals, company culture fit, and any questions you may have.
